EmailTemplate.subject: we want to donate $1,000 to a charity of your choice (1494967762.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Matthew, Thank you for completing the Turbonomic IT Maturity Survey! You should receive your Amazon Gift Card shortly. I can offer you another $100 Amazon Gift Card if I can schedule 30 minutes between you and a Turbonomic Engineer. Furthermore, if after our 30 minute call you decided to engage in an evaluation of Turbonomic, we will make a donation in your name of $1,000 to a 503c charity of your choice.. You indicated on your survey several challenges that Turbonomic directly addresses, specifically: - Overprovisioned Infrastructure and Inefficiency - Turbonomic has been proven to reduce infrastructure requirements by 30% or more through intelligent consolidation - Troubleshooting/Proactive Monitoring - Turbonomic has been proven to decrease performance alerts by 80% or more through its patented automation engine - Administrative Costs (High Admin:Workload Ratio) - Turbonomic has been proven to empower organizations to manage 10x more workloads with the same headcount through its intelligent automation - Properly Utilizing Automation - Turbonomic’s patented algorithm automates the right workload placement, sizing, and scaling decisions for you in real-time, reducing the need for manual management. For enterprises leveraging a self-service model, Turbonomic integrates with all major cloud management tools to support continuous integration and continuous deployment for seamless workload provisioning. Do you have some time to speak today? To receive your gift card, you must schedule your consultation within the next 7 days and complete it within the next 14 days. Thank you,Maggie Margaret Schroeder - Turbonomic Sales Development Representative O: 857.305.4608 C: 802.440.2128 500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
